<p><strong>This course explores how trees shape climate – through structure, species, and space. You’ll work with light, data, and form to bring landscapes to life.</strong></p>

<p><strong>What you’ll do:</strong></p>
<ul>
  <li>Scan trees and extract their shape</li>
  <li>Translate structure into leaf density</li>
  <li>Assign species traits for climate response</li>
  <li>Convert real places into model domains</li>
  <li>Compare reality and simulation</li>
</ul>
